document.docAuthor: Yunakov, Nikolai, Nazarenko, Vitalij, Filimonov, Rostislav & Volovnik, Semyon
document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material examined.
232 specimens ( ZIN , SIZK , KUMN , ZMUK , ZMUM , NSPU , IMC SKC SSC ) including
:

Biology. Xerothermic, sandy and ruderal habitats. Adults occur in IV–X. Oligophagous on Asteraceae :
Carduus
,
Cirsium
,
Onopordum
,
Cynara
,
Silybum
,
Centaurea
etc. Larvae in root galls. (Lindenberg 1950; Cawthra 1958 ; Volovnik 1989 ).
